markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eagle-Eye Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3306)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 287 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 247 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

After you drink this elixir, you notice subtle visual details. For the next hour, you gain an item bonus to Perception checks that's greater when attempting to find secret doors and traps.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Eagle-Eye Elixir (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 287 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 548 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 247 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +1, or +2 to find secret doors and traps.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Eagle-Eye Elixir (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 287 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 548 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 247 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 27 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +2, or +3 to find secret doors and traps.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Eagle-Eye Elixir (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 287 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 548 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 247 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +3, or +4 to find secret doors and traps.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Eagle-Eye Elixir (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 287 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 548 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 247 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +3, or +4 to find secret doors and traps. Each time you pass within 10 feet of a secret door or trap, the GM automatically rolls a secret check for you to find it.
name: Eagle-Eye Elixir (Lesser)
